doc:
Lynne Frederick https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lynne_Frederick 0 Lynne Maria Frederick (25 July 1954 – 27 April 1994) was an English film actress, known for her classical “English rose” beauty and delicate, “fairytale princess” features. In a career spanning ten years she made about thirty films or television drama appearances, but she is best remembered as the last wife and widow of Peter Sellers. She was married twice after his death. Lynne_Maria_Frederick ( 25_July_1954 – 27_April_1994 ) was an_English_film_actress , known for her_classical_“_English rose ”_beauty and delicate , “ fairytale_princess_”_features . She was_married twice after his_death .
